Santa_Monica.Freedom Sculpture:
The Freedom Sculpture (Persian: تندیس آزادی‎) is a stainless steel gold and silver monument located on Santa Monica Boulevard in a publicly accessible median at Century City, Los Angeles, California.
The design of the Freedom Sculpture was created by artist and architect Cecil Balmond and commissioned by the Farhang Foundation. It is themed on the Cyrus Cylinder from 2,500 years ago, which is sometimes considered the first declaration of human rights.
